00033 #elif GMX == 45

00039         #include <gromacs/statutil.h>
00040         #include <gromacs/tpxio.h>

00042     extern "C"
00043     {
00044         #include <statutil.h>
00045         #include <typedefs.h>
00046         #include <smalloc.h>
00047         #include <vec.h>
00048         #include <copyrite.h>
00049         #include <statutil.h>
00050         #include <tpxio.h>
00051     }
00052 #else
00053 #error Unsupported GMX version
00054 #endif
00055     // this one is needed because of bool is defined in one of the headers included by gmx
00056     #undef bool
00057 
00058 namespace votca { namespace csg {
00059 
00060 bool GMXTopologyReader::ReadTopology(string file, Topology &top)
00061 { 
00062     gmx_mtop_t mtop;
00063 
00064     int natoms;
00065     // cleanup topology to store new data
00066     top.Cleanup();
00067 
00068 #if GMX == 50
00069     t_inputrec ir;
00070     ::matrix gbox;
00071 
00072     (void)read_tpx((char *)file.c_str(),&ir,gbox,&natoms,NULL,NULL,NULL,&mtop);
00073 #elif GMX == 45
00074     t_inputrec ir;
00075     ::matrix gbox;
00076 
00077     (void)read_tpx((char *)file.c_str(),&ir,gbox,&natoms,NULL,NULL,NULL,&mtop);
00078 #elif GMX == 40
00079     int sss;   // wtf is this
00080     ::real    ttt,lll; // wtf is this
00081     (void)read_tpx((char *)file.c_str(),&sss,&ttt,&lll,NULL,NULL,&natoms,NULL,NULL,NULL,&mtop);
00082 #else
00083 #error Unsupported GMX version
00084 #endif
00085 
00086     int count=0;
00087     for(int iblock=0; iblock<mtop.nmolblock; ++iblock)
00088         count+=mtop.molblock[iblock].nmol;
00089 
00090     if(count != mtop.mols.nr  ) {
00091         throw runtime_error("gromacs topology contains inconsistency in molecule definitons\n\n"
00092                 "A possible reason is an outdated .tpr file. Please rerun grompp to generate a new tpr file.\n"
00093                 "If the problem remains or "
00094                 "you're missing the files to rerun grompp,\n contact the votca mailing list for a solution.");
00095     }
00096 
00097     for(int iblock=0; iblock<mtop.nmolblock; ++iblock) {
00098         gmx_moltype_t *mol
00099                 = &(mtop.moltype[mtop.molblock[iblock].type]);
00100 
00101         string molname =  *(mol->name);
00102 
00103         int res_offset = top.ResidueCount();
00104 
00105         t_atoms *atoms=&(mol->atoms);
00106 
00107         for(int i=0; i < atoms->nres; i++) {
00108 #if GMX == 50
00109                 top.CreateResidue(*(atoms->resinfo[i].name));
00110 #elif GMX == 45
00111                 top.CreateResidue(*(atoms->resinfo[i].name));
00112 #elif GMX == 40
00113                 top.CreateResidue(*(atoms->resname[i]));
00114 #else
00115 #error Unsupported GMX version
00116 #endif
00117         }
00118 
00119         int ifirstatom = 0;
00120         for(int imol=0; imol<mtop.molblock[iblock].nmol; ++imol) {
00121             Molecule *mi = top.CreateMolecule(molname);
00122 
00123             // read the atoms
00124             for(int iatom=0; iatom<mtop.molblock[iblock].natoms_mol; iatom++) {
00125                 t_atom *a = &(atoms->atom[iatom]);
00126 
00127                 // read exclusions
00128                 t_blocka * excl = &(mol->excls);
00129                 // insert exclusions
00130                 list<int> excl_list;
00131                 for(int k=excl->index[iatom]; k<excl->index[iatom+1]; k++) {
00132                     excl_list.push_back(excl->a[k]+ifirstatom);
00133                 }
00134                 top.InsertExclusion(iatom, excl_list);
00135 
00136                 BeadType *type = top.GetOrCreateBeadType(*(atoms->atomtype[iatom]));
00137 #if GMX == 50
00138                 Bead *bead = top.CreateBead(1, *(atoms->atomname[iatom]), type, a->resind, a->m, a->q);
00139 #elif GMX == 45
00140                 Bead *bead = top.CreateBead(1, *(atoms->atomname[iatom]), type, a->resind, a->m, a->q);
00141 #elif GMX == 40
00142                 Bead *bead = top.CreateBead(1, *(atoms->atomname[iatom]), type, a->resnr, a->m, a->q);
00143 #else
00144 #error Unsupported GMX version
00145 #endif
00146 
00147                 stringstream nm;
00148                 nm << bead->getResnr() + 1 << ":" <<  top.getResidue(res_offset + bead->getResnr())->getName() << ":" << bead->getName();
00149                 mi->AddBead(bead, nm.str());
00150             }
00151             ifirstatom+=mtop.molblock[iblock].natoms_mol;
00152         }
00153     }
00154 
00155     return true;
00156 }
